description: Join PRP architects in an immersive adventure through a series of games and puzzles. Can you save the world before time runs out? Can you become the superhero that the planet needs?
facilities: Family activities during open house festival

factsheet.heading: Details
paragraphs: Itâ€™s the year 2070 and the planet is suffering from climate change. The only way to save the planet is to travel back in time to 2020 to change our cities and the way we live! Join PRP architects in an immersive adventure through a series of games and puzzles. Can you save the world before time runs out? Can you become the superhero that the planet needs?

name: Escape The Future
